item.title: Gadwal Police Crack Rs 15 Lakh Cigarette Theft Case: Two Held, One Absconding
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a swift and coordinated investigation, the Jogulamba Gadwal district police successfully solved a major theft case involving cigarette cartons worth approximately â‚¹15 lakhs. Two suspects have been arrested while one remains absconding. Authorities also seized a Maruti Eeco van and two mobile phones used in the crime.
Case Background:
On July 12, 2025, B. Vinay Kumar, aged 42, a businessman and resident of Venkatapuram village in Aiza Mandal, lodged a complaint at the Aiza Police Sta...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
